name: Tetroggle
description:
A simple word game mashup of Tetris and Boggle. It works on mobile, but it's recommended to play on a desktop.

How to play:

  • Use the arrow keys to position, rotate, and drop shapes into place.
  • Type words to select blocks on the screen.
  • Hit escape to clear your selection; hit enter to submit it.
  • The longer the words, the more points you get!
  • If you like this game, please donate!
